p: When we visualized the estimated R 0 versus CHIKV incidence in each municipality, we found the relationship to be relatively dichotomous with an apparent break at approximately R 0 > 2 ( Fig 2). While the relationship between incidence and R 0 is obvious, the stark separation shown by this relationship was surprising and further lead us to investigate alternate lower bounds of 2.5 and 3 (see below).
